attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Charlotte is the most iconic music venue in Leicester.

And it is facing closure, due to economic pressures on the owners.

Since 1985 it has played host to the likes of: 

The Stone Roses, The Charlatans, The Las, Deacon Blue, Primal Scream, Blur, The Levellers, The Manics, Suede, The Cranberries, Pulp, Radiohead, Dodgy, Supergrass, Stereophonics, Squeeze, Muse, Coldplay (pictured), The Coral, Athlete, Snow Patrol, Razorlight, Bloc Party, Scissor Sisters, Arctic Monkeys, The Hoosiers.. And loads more.

After the closure of London landmark the Astoria, it's more important than ever that cities have places for people who enjoy live music.

For the people of Leicester an exciting, intimate live music venue with it's own history is a MUST!

Sign this petition if you feel that the Government should be doing more to help keep live music venues open.
